disclaimers || information

title: admin applications!
body:
i honestly don’t know if this is going to get off the ground or not, but some of you have expressed interest, so i’m opening admin applications! (if you’re seeing this for the first time and don’t know what it is, please go check out the blog!!) 

notes

  • THERE IS NO WAY TO AVOID TRIGGERS AS AN ADMIN!! if you feel you might be seriously triggered by something in the inbox, please, please, please don’t apply! i don’t want anyone getting hurt :( 
  • i’d like to make an admin group chat probably on whatsapp or discord, so it would be best if you have one or both of those! 
  • i can’t guarantee at this point that i’ll accept any admins at all, but i’d definitely like to gauge interest before this (hopefully) takes off! at the moment, i’m managing it fine myself, but it’ll definitely be nice to have more admins, especially ones in other timezones that can handle asks (especially if there’s urgent asks!) that come in while i’m asleep or at school. 

apply here!

-lilac

  • i can’t guarantee at this point that i’ll accept any admins at all, but i’d definitely like to gauge interest before this (hopefully) takes off! at the moment, i’m managing it fine myself, but it’ll definitely be nice to have more admins, especially ones in other timezones that can handle asks (especially if there’s urgent asks!) that come in while i’m asleep or at school.

summary: So I’m not expect Dan to make an appearance on YouTube any time soon, but Mental Health Awareness Month/Week is in May, at least...
body:
So I’m not expect Dan to make an appearance on YouTube any time soon, but Mental Health Awareness Month/Week is in May, at least here in the UK.

Do you think he’ll at least make a tweet about it?

blog.name: softiiednp
blog.title: Three Braincells Gang
blog.description: Joan | 14 | [L]GBT | Main is @fllowercrowns |Multifandom, mostly dan and phil

summary: I watched Onision’s Dan Howell video so you wouldn’t have to
body:
I watched Onision’s Dan Howell video so you wouldn’t have to

Shit Onision said:

  • Phil looks like a bird
  • Dan’s only famous for being cute and edgy
  • Dan wearing an earring in his right ear makes him gay????
  • he heavily implied that dan is spending his hiatus chatting up guys
  • He made fun of Dan’s sexuality a lot and kept insisting Dan is gay
  • Dan joking about climate change (check his recent tweet about golden hour) means he doesn’t truly care about climate change
  • Phil’s glad he has someone cute to make his videos worth watching
  • Dan’s April fools joke roughly translates to: I’m not working yet but thanks anyways for paying me (Dan’s fans are just pay checks)
  • He made a bunch of jokes with homophobic underlines
  • Phil’s ugly
  • Dan’s uploading skills are 1/10
  • Overall rating is 8/10
  • All phannies are stalkers
  • Phil is a child in an adult’s body

Things Onision did:

  • Onision checked tweets from 2013
  • Onision watched videos of people saying shit about dan and phil and even opened a wattpad article about why dan and Phil suck (which was heavily satirical)
  • He shaded the hiatus a lot
  • He talked about all of Dan’s channels’ uploading schedules because dan is taking a break.
  • He made fun of Dan’s old video which I do admit is cringey but literally everyone’s old videos were
  • Made homophobic jokes about dan


My two cents on this whole video: This isn’t one of his most offending videos, but I blame that on Dan being unproblematic rather than Onision actually trying to be a good person. Onision still tried digging up random shit to make fun of dan for AND he made fun of his sexuality which is just fucked up. Also, making it seem like Dan only cares for his fans for pay checks? Gross. I’ve never seen youtubers who cares about their fans more than Dan and Phil. He made fun of dan and phil’s appearance so many times it’s disgusting. The video’s just fucking disgusting and gross and messed up and just ew.

PLEASE DONT WATCH THE VIDEO AND GIVE ONISION VIEWS. I already hate the fact that I watched it myself. It just gives Onision more money and he benefits from your views whether or not you thumbs downed.

summary: Guys look... IT IS NOT OK TO POST STALKER PHOTOS OF DAN AND PHIL....EVER.   I don’t care if they are all over twitter or here or...
body:
Guys look… IT IS NOT OK TO POST STALKER PHOTOS OF DAN AND PHIL….EVER.   I don’t care if they are all over twitter or here or the front page of a newspaper.. It is never ok.   They are entitled to walk out the cinema without being stalked, entitled to go ANYWHERE without being stalked and photographed.

Its really not that hard to grasp.

summary: So I figured it was time I talked about these things. My parents got me LIFE SIZED Dan and Phil cardboard cutouts for Christmas....
body: So I figured it was time I talked about these things. My parents got me LIFE SIZED Dan and Phil cardboard cutouts for Christmas. Very scary. I’m still not used to them. They’re too big to fit in any of our storage space so they just stand in our living room. It’s a great conversation starter.
